nodes.text: Tomin-brel lived on the planet Coruscant and served as a police officer with the Coruscant Security Force. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic the reconstituted Sith Empire, he supplied his fellow officers with armor from a small shop near the taxi station in Black Sun territory.
Tomin-brel was a Human male with brown hair, dark eyes and he had tan skin. Berric wore a Coruscant Security Force uniform and carried a side arm blaster pistol.
Tomin-brel appears in the BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a medium armor vendor on Coruscant.
